author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s one thing if you want to protest in favor of policies that contradict biological realities, but it’s another level when you attempt to prove your lack of point by accosting a mom and her baby. And that is exactly what happened at the “Rattle in Seattle” protest outside City Hall on Tuesday.

Behold: The Side of Compassion…

🚨BREAKING: Seattle City Hall protestors just surrounded and accosted a woman, her baby, and her toddler before a melee with the police broke out.

My phone ran out of storage just before the melee. No update on the woman and baby. pic.twitter.com/bKgZoYEZJe
— Cam Higby | America First 🇺🇸 (@camhigby) May 28, 20
title: Trans activists accost mother and her baby as they attempt to attend a Christian event in Seattle

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Project Veritas released part of an undercover investigation that revealed who was actually in charge of the Biden Administration, and it certainly was not Joe Biden.

BREAKING: Undercover Meeting with DNC Leader @davidhogg111 Reveals who REALLY ran the Biden White House

“He wielded an enormous amount of power... I can’t stress to you enough how much power he had at the White House.”

"It was an open secret... I would avoid him, he was… pic.twitter.com/i7fskTwhNw
— Project Veritas (@Project_Veritas) May 28, 2025
title: Undercover footage captures DNC official David Hogg admitting what WH staffer was the one who REALLY ran the Biden Admin

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
President Trump is targeting Harvard, aiming to redirect funds and promote entrepreneurship without the traditional college route. Is this the future of America, or does college still hold the key to success? Today’s show dives into this.

"The left wants you to believe that Harvard is necessary and that it helps America. But they actually hurt America,” Crowder said. "Harvard as an institution hurts America, and so do many Ivy League schools. They’ll try to convince you they are private institutions, but when you look at how much federal funding they receive compared to their endowment and spending, that’s not really the case."
title: Watch: Why Donald Trump is Right to Go After Anti-American Harvard University

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
According to a NewsNation exclusive, “USDA gave loan relief only to minority farmers.”

I met with a USDA whistleblower.

He says the Biden administration forgave farm loans for only non-white farmers and when they were told it was illegal, continued to secretly do it.

Kept it "hushed for the obvious implications of race based loan forgivingness."

Full story: pic.twitter.com/0SMwAnLtsT
— Brian Entin (@BrianEntin) May 28, 2025
title: Whistleblower makes explosive allegation Biden Admin forgave loans to farmers... as long as they weren't White

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
AOC recently gave Border Czar Tom Homan a stern finger-pointing for charging Rep. LaMonica McIver for assaulting ICE officers. She went as far as to claim that “if [he] put a finger on Congress people that were at the Newark facility, there would be consequences.” However, Homan has confirmed he is still “waiting on the consequences.”

🚨 LMAO! Tom Homan just ROASTED AOC after DOJ arrested Rep. LaMonica McIver for assauIting ICE

"Remember couple weeks ago AOC said 'if you put a finger on Congress people from the Newark facility, there would be consequences?' Well, guess what? We did it. I'm waiting on the… pic.twitter.com/KVnGEGL7t4
— Nick Sortor (@nicksortor)
title: AOC promised "consequences" for Trump's Border Czar, now Tom Homan is challenging her to put up or shut up

author: Brodigan
description:
Jake Tapper continues to try to gain fans on the right side of the aisle by insulting the Left. It’s a bold strategy, Cotton. President Donald Trump is coming down on Harvard and they definitely deserve it. He has a plan to reroute the money and encourage people to go into business without spending time in school. Is this the new future of America or is college still the road to success?

WATCH & REACT

  • BACKPACKING
  • FAMILY CAMP
title: Trump vs. Harvard: Why The President is Right to Go After This Anti-American University (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
The billionaires who control the left decided to make Elon Musk the boogeyman at the start of the Trump Administration. Anything that went wrong anywhere was the fault of Cousin Elon and DOGE. Low-information voters think Elon is stealing their social security and personal information because that's what Democrats lied about, knowing the media would swear by it. Nevertheless, he persisted because he felt the work DOGE was doing was important. His reward for taking on all the attacks and working twenty-hour days?

Republicans not doing anything to codify DOGE cuts into law, and them passing a big, beautiful bill that increased the deficit.

Welcome to the Tea Party circa 2010, Elon. We coined a phrase for this. "Failure Theater."

I was, like, disappointed to see the massive spending bill, frankly, which increases the
title: Elon Musk realizes GOP actively "undermines the work that the DOGE team is doing" after he took on all the media attacks

author: Brodigan
description:
Let's be clear from the jump: Jake Tapper deserves zero credit for this. We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website award Jake Tapper zero credit for his come-to-Jesus moment over what horrible people the Left are. I know that you know he knows he'd never say this out loud if he hadn't been selling a book. But when podcasters alluded to all cops being bastards when Jake said his fifteen-year-old son wanted to be one, it was like a lightbulb went off.

Tapper was on The Prof G Pod, where he shared a story from when he was on another podcast and mentioned his fifteen-year-old son, who likes to play football, wanted to be a police officer. The prog hosts turn it into a quip by asking how his son feels about minorities.

Like the idea that he w
title: "This is why you f***ers lost": Jake Tapper suddenly realizes what garbage people progressives are when they attack his son

author: Kate Cornell
description:
Don't buy this. I read it so you don't have to.

Original Sin by Jake Tapper and Alex Thompson is the story of the cover-up of Joe Biden’s mental decline and his decision to run for reelection. I can’t tell you what’s a lie, but I can tell you that it’s not the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth. This book is a cover-up. It’s the cover-up of the cover-up.

The very idea that someone like Jake Tapper is eligible to put his name on a book like Original Sin is laughable in its own right. As if he wa
title: The Cover-up of the cover-up: Our review of "Original Sin" by Jake Tapper and Alex Thompson
